content:
Sure, I can group the list and nest related areas to the main area as follows:

* Teeth
* Face
	+ Lower face
	+ Nasolabial folds or smile lines
	+ Balding or thinning areas
* Neck
	+ Laryngeal prominence of thyroid cartilage
* Body
	+ Abdomen
	+ Hips
	+ Thighs
	+ Arms
	+ Buttocks
	+ Cellulite
* Jawline
	+ Upper jawbone
	+ Lower jawbone
* Skin tissue
	+ Lower layers of skin tissue
* Facial rejuvenation
	+ Facial reconstruction
	+ Abdominal wall reconstruction
	+ Breast reconstruction
* Gastric
* Nipple-areola complex
* Nostrils
* Underarms
* Severe cystic acne
* Mild to severe acne
* Spider veins
	+ Small, uncomplicated spider veins
* Varicose veins

I have grouped related areas under a main area, and nested them accordingly. Note that some items on the list may overlap with each other, and some items may fit into multiple categories, but I have tried to group them in the most logical way possible.
